header.title: Debt: The Most-Perfectly-Designed “Perpetual Motion Machine” Ever Devised

title: Debt: The Most-Perfectly-Designed “Perpetual Motion Machine” Ever Devised
content:
Borrowed money – or debt – impedes progress since interest must be paid. This can be seen as ‘friction’ in physical terms.
Low interest rates are the snare which will catch the entire system.
Why the reported GDP figures are a lie.
Several studies have analyzed what happens to people with overwhelming debt.
Yet the system has trapped people into believing that only more debt is the answer to their problems.
State, corporate and personal debt are reaching saturation point.
A few words on last week’s unemployment numbers.
Real growth for most people has simply not occurred since the 1980s.
A few words on the stock market.
Update to the current sign-ups in Obamacare.
Not encouraging.
The terrible state of finance at American corporations.
A UK politician expresses his resentment that Russia should dare to fight back with its own sanctions, given the imposition of sanctions on it.
